ygData.subject: Skill advancement
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Well I guess asking how to make Studs and Bonding is not an intelligent question (and here I thought this list was to share information about smithing)
ygData.messageBody:
Hello

Well I guess asking how to make Studs and Bonding is not an intelligent
question (and here I thought this list was to share information about
smithing) so I will ask another. I am currently at 69 smithing, I have a 50
to 75% success rate on bracers and gorgets and slightly lower on boots and
roughly 25% on helms and masks. I am still working off and on with skewers
but it has been a while since I have gotten any gain from them. So question
is: From a strictly skill improvement point of view what is the best way to
raising smithing at 69 skill.

Thanks again
Silver
